description:
Players take on the role of a castaway who wakes up on a mysterious island. He discovers that on this seemingly paradise island, fighting takes place in a coliseum. As you explore the place in search of answers, the FBI is secretly investigating what is happening on the island, unleashing an intriguing plot full of mystery, action, and shocking moral decisions. The player must fight to survive while unraveling the island's dark secrets and deciding the course of the story.

·Plot: The player assumes the role of a castaway who wakes up on an enigmatic, seemingly paradisiacal island.

·Combat Coliseum: Discover that on the island, combats to the death are carried out in a coliseum, challenging your survival.
FBI Investigation: While exploring the island for answers, it is revealed that the FBI is conducting a secret investigation into events on the island.

·Intriguing Plot: The narrative unfolds in an intriguing plot full of mystery, action and shocking moral decisions.

·Survive and discover: The player must fight to survive while unraveling the island's dark secrets and making decisions that will affect the course of the story.

·Exploration: Exploration of the island reveals hidden clues and secrets that shed light on the true nature of the fighting and the conspiracy behind it.

In "Castaway of Steel," players are immersed in a gaming experience that combines survival on a mysterious island with the investigation of an enigma by the FBI, creating an exciting and suspenseful experience.
name: Castaway of Steel
